text: Ferdi Tayfur (; born Ferdi Tayfur Turanbayburt; 15 November 1945 â€“ 2 January 2025) was a Turkish singer-songwriter, actor, director and screenwriter. He was born in Adana, Turkey. He mainly sung Arabesque music. He was known as "Ferdi Baba". He founded Ferdifon Records in 1982.
